description: This course presents general principals of toxicology and the disposition of toxins in the body. Case studies of the effects of environmental and occupational toxins on individuals will be analyzed. This course is designed for students who desire a strong foundation in toxicological concepts and principals and provides an overview of major toxins in our environment and their association with human health.
name: ENVIRONMENTAL TOXICOLOGY: RISK ASSESSMENT AND HEALTH EFFECTS
